name: EssentialOilBenefits
0:
”Alexa ask Essential Oil Benefits to give me an essential oil fact”
”benefit of oil”
”tell me a fact about essential oils”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: essential oil benefits
des:
Essential oils are popular household items. With diffusers increasing in popularity, this app will teach you about popular scents and tips on how to apply them easily to your daily routine or in the household. 

The information in this skill is provided for informational purposes only. 
The facts are brief and general. Please do more research and reach out to your doctor for specific medical purposes. Essential oils are not proven to treat or diagnose symptoms or diseases. The following are general guidelines and safety precautions to be aware of when using essential oils. Please contact your doctor for specific essential oil related questions, ( for example, especially if you have specific allergies, are epileptic, pregnant, ect.)

Keep away from children and pets. Please do additional research on the specific essential oil before digesting or applying on skin. Some essential oils need to be diluted depending on the brand and how they were made. Not all essential oils can be used on the skin. Not all essential oils have been tested on humans. Flush out with water immediately if essential oil gets into the eyes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
